original_text: The silly women took their lamps with them, but they did not take any extra oil with them.
korean_text: 미련한 자들은 등을 가지되 기름을 가지지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: The silly women took their lamps with them
sentences.korean_translation: 어리석은 여자들은 그들의 등불을 가지고 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: but they did not take any extra oil with them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 여분의 기름을 가지고 가지 않았습니다
